page.title: 05SELF-EMPLOYED IN GEISE AREA
page.content:
FOR SUCH A SPARSELY POPULATED AREA THERE ARE A NUMBER OF SELF EMPLOYED WITH QUITE A VARIETY OF OCCUPATIONS. AT GLENGOLLY THERE IS A BLACKSMITH, A GARDEN CENTRE, TWO MOBILE VANS AND A FARMING ENGINEER, AT JANETSTOWN ANOTHER FARMING ENGINEER AND AT ACHNAVAST A JOINER.
THE GARDEN CENTRE AT GLENGOLLY IS A FLOURISHING SMALL BUSINESS OPENED 4 YEARS AGO. IT IS A FAMILY BUSINESS SELLING MAINLY HARDY ORNAMENTAL PLANTS, FRUIT BUSHES, SHRUBS, TREES AND ANNUAL PLANTS. ALSO ON SALE ARE HAND-MADE STONE PLANT CONTAINERS, BIRD BATHS ETC. MADE BY THE OWNER.
